page.title: 05Farming at Rogate
page.content: The farmer has been working on Slade Farm for 30 years he hopes his sons will follow after him. Machinery on this farm now costs more than it did but he still buys some every year. Last year he bought three new tractors and some smaller things like sprayers and ploughs. He uses three different types of tractors a John Deere, a Ford and a Massey Ferguson. A combine harvester costs about Â£55,000 to Â£60,000 and weighs about 10 tons. His list of machinery looks like this 2 international combines 2 bailers, 1 round bailer and 1 square 14 tractors 10 trailers 3 ploughs 6 fertilzers 4 cultivators 1 potato harvester 2 dung spreaders and much more.
